CANDIDATE 		Stuart Sutherland
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		North West - Wirral
QUALIFICATIONS
Key Courses and Training
Basic Electronics – 1998 – Intec College South Africa.
Siemens S7-300 basic programming.
Dr Boy Germany 2 weeks training on Dr Boy injection moulders.
Ferlin Gravimetric Netherlands 2 weeks training.
Hesta Germany 2 weeks training on blow moulding machines.
Nissei Japan 2 weeks training on fault finding and diagnostic tests
on injection moulders.
LG/LS Korea 2 weeks training on building and testing Injection moulders.
Netstal Switzerland 7 weeks training on machine repairs and service.
CAREER SUMMARY
Dec 2019 to date Krauss Maffei
Position: Service Engineer
Trained in Switzerland Jan/Feb 2020 on Netstal Injection Molders.
Working on repairs and service of Netstal and Krauss CANDIDATE 		Stuart Sutherland
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		North West - Wirral

CAREER SUMMARY
Dec 2019 to date Krauss Maffei
Position: Service Engineer
Trained in Switzerland Jan/Feb 2020 on Netstal Injection Molders.
Working on repairs and service of Netstal and Krauss Maffei injection moulders through out UK and Ireland.
2013 to 2019 Anarchy Joe’s (South Africa)
Position: Director
Specializing in Sales and Repairs for all Injection Molding Machines in the Plastics Industry. Maintained over 60 Customer accounts. Full management of company and sales. Procurement and recruitment.
1996 to 2013 PMS Plastics (South Africa)
Position: Head Technician
Full responsibilities of Head Technician. Running workshop, call outs, staff leadership, procurement. Project management of breakdowns and bookings schedules
1995 to 1996 Relloy SA
Position: Apprentice
Assistance in repairs of screws and barrels, assisting service technician out in the field on repairs and maintenance of injection moulders
COMMENT
Highly motivated and capable employee. Extensive experience in management, sales in the injection and blow molding industry. Repairs, maintenance and upgrade expertise. Able to work across all levels in an organization. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to successfully deliver projects on time, tactically lead and motivate people.
Key Skills
Team leader and Team player
Hydraulics & Pump Conversions
Electrical Faults & Basic Electronics
Mechanical & Pneumatics
Plc Programming & HMI Development
Management, Sales & Leadership
Excellent Communication Skills
Procurement & Risk Management
Full Clean UK Driving License
IT Proficient
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
